Environment VariablesÔÉÅ

  • NO_COLOR: Disable all styling (respects standard)

  • FORCE_COLOR: Force enable styling even when not TTY

# Disable colors
NO_COLOR=1 python app.py

# Force colors in pipes
FORCE_COLOR=1 python app.py | less -R
